title: Who is the most 'maknae-like' K-pop group leader? - Quora

response.answer_text: Probably Mamamoo’s Solar: At the first look, most people think Hwasa is the oldest and Solar is the youngest ;) With her youthful visuals she can look so:  Solar(left), Hwasa (right) But they are in for a big surprise when they get to know that Leader Solar is actually the oldest X) while Hwasa is the youngest.(don’t worry you are not surprised alone) I mean who can NOT fall for her cuteness.  or her charisma  Or her leading abilities 😍 6 Times MAMAMOO's Solar Proved She Is A Badass Leader Honorable mention: Snsd’s Taeyeon  Seohyun(left), Taeyeon (right)
